org.lenskit.predict

Class QuantizedRatingPredictor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.basic.AbstractRatingPredictor
      • org.lenskit.predict.QuantizedRatingPredictor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RatingPredictor

    public class QuantizedRatingPredictor
extends AbstractRatingPredictor

    A rating predictor wrapper that quantizes scores to compute predictions.

    • Method Detail

      • predictWithDetails

        @Nonnull
public ResultMap predictWithDetails(long user,
                                             @Nonnull
                                             java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> items)
        Description copied from interface: RatingPredictor

        Predict the user’s preference for a collection of items, potentially with additional details.

        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate predicts.
        items - The items to predict for.
        Returns:
        A mapping from item IDs to predicted preference. This mapping may not contain all requested items.
